target.name: New annotation
target.query: SELECT time as "time", stage as "text" FROM sync_status WHERE type = 'start' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host"::tag = 'ethtest1.local') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
